description: The initiative focuses on sustainable agriculture and food sovereignty, aiming to create a regenerative model that benefits both the environment and the community. It emphasizes the importance of collaboration, ecological practices, and the cultivation of diverse crops, particularly macadamia. By fostering a sense of community and promoting healthy food production, the initiative seeks to inspire others to adopt similar practices, ultimately contributing to a more sustainable and conscious way of living.
name: Granja La Canela
